long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you close multiple tabs that all originate from the same domain. Usually a domain (like mail.google.com) corresponds pretty well to an "application" so you can close the "application" in bulk once you're done with it which is often more efficient than closing individual tabs.
